ing: 1/2 pound cooked shrimp (tails removed), cut in bite-sized pieces
1 (6 ounce) container fat-free Key lime yogurt
n: Quick Shrimp Salad With Key Lime Dressing
des: "This refreshing, minty salad takes about 10 minutes to throw together. The oranges and broccoli are rich in antioxidants, the shrimp are high in protein and low in fat, and the yogurt has protective bacteria."
ins: In a medium bowl, combine all ingredients. Refrigerate; serve chilled. Garnish with mint sprigs.
